iosPermissions.NSCameraUsageDescription: YFIT needs camera access to scan food barcodes and analyze workout form.
iosPermissions.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: YFIT needs photo library access to save progress photos.
iosPermissions.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: YFIT needs permission to save photos to your library.

iosPermissions.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: YFIT needs access to read your health data including steps, heart rate, sleep, and workouts to provide personalized fitness insights.
iosPermissions.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: YFIT needs permission to save workout data to Apple Health.
